Action.author: jyellick
Action.body: With both this, and FAB-4427 the {{-inspect*}} commands are being pointed at JSON files, when they only support proto files. it appears as if the attempt is to write to a JSON file, when in fact the command is trying _read_ this JSON file, and this is causing the errors.

Action.author: jyellick
Action.body: Usage is still incorrect, but pushed a fix via https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/10279/ to make the incorrect usage more apparent.
